info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Powell County through 600 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles west of Helena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blossburg and Elliston. This includes Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 16 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
